name: Marble Escape
description:
Solve puzzles to get the heavy marble to the exit gate. Simple enough!

Monsters control some of the levels, watch out for the evil Snowmen, and deceptively cute Wabbits. Don' t eat the Mushrooms, even the flowers can be a little volatile.

Lasers will hurt you, Pea-Shooters will knock you.

Use thumpers to defy gravity and fly through the sky

Control doors and teleporters to find your way to the exit gate.

Three difficulty levels. Easy-Peasy, Normal and Insane.
